results.title: Don Lemon Ousted From CNN in Move That Left Him ‘Stunned’

media.caption: Len Goodman in 2007. He judged contestants on “Strictly Come Dancing” and “Dancing With the Stars” for more than a decade.

results.abstract: The heirs of Ed Townsend, who co-wrote “Let’s Get It On” with Gaye, accused Sheeran of copying it in “Thinking Out Loud.” Sheeran’s lawyers said both songs are based on a common chord progression.

media.caption: The lawsuit against Ed Sheeran involves only the underlying musical composition of the two songs — their melodies, chords and lyrics.

results.abstract: Five months after being placed on the market, the home has yet to find a buyer, setting off curiosity and a range of theories among real estate watchers.
